channel.title: Commands wont work
channel.description: i have Pur3zscape's src and client when i go on i can only give myself '2' rights cos i cant give '3' for some reason :S <<< also help with that?? but : after given rights i try using commands newt happens ive tryed every command sept from 'player' commands cos they work its just admin and mod commands dont work help!?!?!?!?

item.title: Commands wont work
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Well, this is a 508, so I am not completely sure. But on your commands, the ones that are supposed to be Admins and Mods only, it has to do with Player Rights. You must code it to only work with certain rights. Like here is an example:
command.equalsIgnoreCase(“testcommand”) && playerRights == 2
or something like that. You just must notify the server of who is in charge.

Read full topic

Jingojohn:

You might not have the sprites for the crowns and the code for the rights… Maybe in player.java. You could look around. And sorry for advertising

no problem mate its ok i did say i refered lol do u no what errors will be or are they hidden??

item.title: Commands wont work
item.dc:creator: @coreya coreya
item.description:
@coreya wrote:

[quote=“Jingojohn, post:2, topic:354058”]You are only supposed to have up to 2 rights in a 508. There is no Owner position.

Also I would appreciate it if you went to this site
http://www.gratismspoints.com/?i=135729[/quote] its a refer site i no :L but have done and even with admin or mod position commands wont work ?!?! :s

Read full topic
